pageContext.claim: “But, at the same time, on the assumption that [Biden] does, he is going on and on with lie after lie. So, I had to correct those lies as they came up, too many to go back and get.”
pageContext.analysis: Pot calling the kettle black. When The Fact Checker assessed the debate in two fact checks, we identified 47 false or misleading claims by Trump and seven claims by Biden.
